name: Rise In Air
description:
This game is a variation of the endless runner games. In the game, the player is a hot air balloon controller, who takes people on a ride in his hot air balloon to make a living. A hot air balloon rises up continuously in the air, then it goes high and high. There are obstacles in the path depending on the scene in which the balloon is rising. On colliding with the obstacle the balloon will pop and the game will be over. Fuel cans will be provided so that the journey can be continued for as long as possible. 

Characters

The player will play as a hot air balloon controller and rise up endlessly avoiding obstacles that can pop the balloon and also picking up powerups to reach as high as possible.

Goal

Rise in the air as high as possible and score high so that the passenger on the balloon gets happy and gives us a high fare.

Rules
  1. The game board is a vertical view of the world.
  2. The game board will consist of obstacles and power-ups.
  3. Game over when the player hits an obstacle.
  4. A score counter will count the height that the balloon has risen.
  5. The pace of rising will increase whenever the player reaches a certain height.
  6. The player can move right or left only.
Controls:

To go right - D or (right arrow)
To go left - A or (left arrow)
